text: Emma's Shadow () is a 1988 Danish drama movie directed by Søren Kragh- Jacobsen. It stars Line Kruse, Börje Ahlstedt, Inge Sofie Skovbo, Henrik Larsen, Ken Vedsegaard and Bent N. Steinert. == Other websites == * Category:1988 drama movies Category:Danish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Søren Kragh-Jacobsen
title: Emma's Shadow
